high_descs: Turn around and walk forward to the bottle of soap on the counter by the green towel.
Pick up the bottle of soap from the counter.
Turn around, walk forward to the door, then turn right and walk to the toilet.
Put the bottle of soap on the top of the toilet, behind the spray bottle.
anns.task_desc: Move a bottle of soap from a counter to the top of a toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to the area to the right of the bathtub
Pick up the soap bottle that is sitting to the right of the bathtub
Turn around and cross the room then make a right and walk to the counter top that is on the left of the sink
Place the bottle of soap on the back of the toilet to the right of the spray bottle
anns.task_desc: Put a bottle of soap on the back of a toilet

high_descs: Walk over to the right side of the tub.
Pick up the bottle of soap off of the tub.
Walk over to the left side of the sink counter.
Put the bottle of soap on the toilet tank that is to the left of the counter.
anns.task_desc: Move a bottle of soap to the toilet tank.
